channel.title: Jarred Client works for my friend webclient doesnt
channel.description: I gave my friend the client.jar i used for the client and he was able to connect using it i even teamviewed him to make sure but then whn i upload it to my site and run the webclient html i have it goes all the way to sign in spot and if you try and sign in it says unable to connect like the ip is incorrect please help thanks it is a shard and i have signed it correctly

item.title: Jarred Client works for my friend webclient doesnt
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

Dent145:

I gave my friend the client.jar i used for the client and he was able to connect using it i even teamviewed him to make sure but then whn i upload it to my site and run the webclient html i have it goes all the way to sign in spot and if you try and sign in it says unable to connect like the ip is incorrect please help thanks it is a shard and i have signed it correctly

lol you wont beable to sign in u have to connect local other people it should work just fine if it loads

Read full topic

item.title: Jarred Client works for my friend webclient doesnt
item.dc:creator: @Dent145 Dent145
item.description:
@Dent145 wrote:

[quote=“Lordabyssal, post:2, topic:494761”]Are you getting error connecting to server.

If so then make sure your IPS! are correct. Localhost = 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1.[/quote] it is correct if my friend is able to connect using the jarred and signed client then It must be correct

Read full topic

item.title: Jarred Client works for my friend webclient doesnt
item.dc:creator: @Lordabyssal Lordabyssal
item.description:
@Lordabyssal wrote:

Are you getting error connecting to server.

If so then make sure your IPS! are correct. Localhost = 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1.
